verbs.description: [ARG0: Officials] [V: say] [ARG1: President Trump intends to nominate Susan Pamerleau to be the next United States Marshal for the Western District of Texas] .
Officials say [ARG0: President Trump] [V: intends] [ARG1: to nominate Susan Pamerleau to be the next United States Marshal for the Western District of Texas] .
Officials say [ARG0: President Trump] intends to [V: nominate] [ARG1: Susan Pamerleau] [ARG2: to be the next United States Marshal for the Western District of Texas] .
Officials say President Trump intends to nominate [ARG1: Susan Pamerleau] to [V: be] [ARG2: the next United States Marshal for the Western District of Texas] .
